text:
Ro: Hey guys, it’s Ro! Welcome to another
Nerdy Nummies!

Ro: Today I have a very special guest, it’s
my friend Dawin!
Dawn: What’s up guys!?!?

Ro: Look at this face! I missed it so much,
he has been traveling the world

Ro: and touring and I’m so happy that you’re
here!

Ro: I’m gonna put all of his links down
below, go check him out he’s a very

Ro: talented music artist, I love all of your
songs, especially your new song
Ro: Throwback! Dawin: Oh thank you so much!

Ro: It is catchy! Dawin: Oh, I appreciate
that! Ro: And I like the dance!

Dawin: Ooooh! Ro: Can you teach us the dance
a little bit?

Dawin: Yeah let’s do it, look. You start
with this way, to the left. Ro: Uh-huh.

Dawin: So it’s 1, 2, 3, 4… Oooh-oooh,
Throwback, throwback!
Dawin: Know that, know that!
Dawin: Oooh look at you! Aw!
Dawin: She likes to dance!
Ro: What else do you got going on?

Dawin: Well lately I’ve been traveling the
world, I’ve been working on an

Dawin: album, I’m very excited about it
because it’s my first album.

Dawin: Can’t wait for you guys to hear it,
it’s very exciting for me.
Ro: I’m excited! Dawin: Oh!

Ro: I got so many requests from you guys to
make another breakfast on Nerdy Nummies,

Ro: and specifically, the Adventure Time Bacon
Pancake.

Ro: And for anyone who isn’t familiar, in
the cartoon Adventure Time, the

Ro: dog Jake is making breakfast and he’s
making pancakes and he puts bacon

Ro: in the pancakes! Two breakfast foods combined!
So that is exactly
Ro: what we’re gonna be making today!
Both: Let’s get started!
Ro: Nee-nee-da-nee-nee-da-da-dee-dee-dee!

Ro: The things you will need, will be: Some
maple syrup, 1-1/2 cups of flour,

Ro: 3-1/2 teaspoons of baking powder, 1 whole
egg, 1 teaspoon of salt,

Ro: 1 tablespoon of sugar. Dawin: 1-1/4 cup
of milk, 3 tablespoons of butter
Dawin: and 16 slices of turkey bacon.
Ro: Now let’s… Both: Put it all together!

Ro: The first thing we’re gonna do is bake our
bacon, we’re gonna put our bacon

Ro: onto a parchment lined cookie sheet. We
got 2 cookie sheets so I won’t eat

Ro: all of your food. Just use your fingers,
spread ‘em out.

Dawin: Is it like a race? Ro: Like this? Dawin:
Oh you’re winning!

Dawin: Now we’re gonna pop these in the
oven at 350 degrees.

Ro: And bake them for about 12-15 minutes. About
1/2 way through you’re gonna
Ro: switch them on the racks, so top to bottom, bottom to top.

Dawin: So while our bacon is in the oven,
we’re gonna make our pancake batter.

Ro: Mmmhmmm, the first thing that we’re
gonna do is whisk together our dry ingredients.

Ro: We’re gonna whisk together our flour,
sugar, baking powder and salt.

Ro: Dawin, will you whisk for me, and I’m
just keep pouring here into this bowl.
Dawin: I’ll be honored. Ro: So we got flour…
Ro: Wee-oop! Woop!
Ro: Nice job, nice job!
Dawin: Are you just saying that?

Ro: No you’re doing good! Dawin: OK. Ro:
Just whisk together until its well combined.

Dawin: Now that this is all whisked up we’re
gonna add our wet ingredients.

Ro: Mmmmhmmm. Over here, we’ve got our milk,
melted butter, and our egg.

Ro: I’ll do the egg because this is the
messy part, you can add the butter,
Dawin: Uh-oh, everyone stand back!

Ro: Want to go at the same time? Dawin: We
can do that, let’s do it!
Dawin: Oooh! Ro: Then the milk!

Ro: Now using a hand mixer, we’re gonna
mix the batter together until
Ro: it’s well combined.

Dawin: Alright you guys, we got our pancake
batter all ready to go.

Ro: Mmmmhmmm, and we’ve got our Turkey Bacon
fresh out of the oven.

Ro: Now we’re gonna take our bacon and our
batter, over to the stove.

Ro: We’re gonna make some pancakes. Dawin:
Can’t wait!

Ro: Can I get a high five for that? Dawin:
Yes you can. Ro: It’s pancake time!

Ro: Turn the heat to medium and allow the
pan to heat completely, then turn

Ro: the heat to low and butter the pan, wiping
away any excess butter.

Ro: Pour in 1/3 cup of pancake batter and
cook until bubbles form at the top.

Dawin: Add 2 strips of turkey bacon to the
top and flip the pancake over.

Dawin: Allow the pancake to cook an additional
minute and remove from pan.

Dawin: Repeat until all your pancakes are
cooked, and now, it’s time to eat!
Both: Ta-da!

Ro: Here are the Adventure Time Bacon Pancakes
that we made today!

Ro: A big thank you to you guys for suggesting
something Adventure Time and,

Ro: a big thank you to my friend Dawin for
helping me make breakfast today!

Dawin: Thank you so much for having me, these
look amazing and I can’t wait to
Dawin: try them! Ro: Aw, me too!

Ro: So I’m gonna put all of his links down
below, to all the music, especially
Ro: your new song Throwback. Dawin: Oooh!

🎶You want that throwback, throwback type
of thing🎶

🎶Baby you know that’s what I bring, check
it!🎶
Dawn: You got it! She got the moves!
🎶I’m gonna take it way back🎶

Ro: I’m gonna be posting lots of pictures
of these breakfast treats on

Ro: Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr and Instagram,
and if you guys make them,

Ro: Please take a picture and send it to me,
I love seeing your baking creations,
Ro: it just makes my day!

Ro: And, if you have any other ideas for any
other Nerdy Nummies,

Ro: please let me know, leave me a comment
down below and I will do my best to

Ro: make it happen. Alright, thanks again
you guys, bye-bye!
Both: Bacon pancakes, makin’ bacon pancakes!
Both: Take some bacon and I put it in a pancake!

Both: Bacon Pancakes, that’s what it’s
gonna make!
Both: Bacon Pancakes!
Ro: Alright, it’s time for breakfast!

Ro: I’m gonna put a little syrup on, just
a little bit.

Dawin: Oooh, could I have some? Ro: Yeah,
if you’d like some.
Ro: Cheers! Dawin: Cheers!
Dawin: Mmmmm! Ro: Mmmmm!
Ro: Mmmmm-mmmm-mmm, mmm-mmm-mmm!
